definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: An autotrophic unicellular green alga presents the minimum of specialization.
sentences.chinese: 一个自养的单细胞绿藻表现最小程度的特化。

sentences.english: An abscission zone occurs at the base of the organ.
sentences.chinese: 脱落区发生在器官基部的某一特化的区域。

sentences.english: Root hairs are long tubular outgrowths that form on the surface of specialized epidermal cells.
sentences.chinese: 根毛是植物特化的表皮细胞上的一些管状突起。

sentences.english: Deinopids are large to very large spiders that build highly modified orb webs (Coddington, 1986b).
sentences.chinese: 妖面蛛为大型到较大型蜘蛛，建造高度特化的圆网。

sentences.english: Consider also using separate files for template specializations .
sentences.chinese: 对于模板特化，也可考虑指派单独的文件。

sentences.english: Guard cell A specialized kidney-shaped epidermal cell, located to the side of a STOMA.
sentences.chinese: 是植物中一种特化的肾形表皮细胞，位于气孔两侧。

sentences.english: The specialization of the cytoplasmic structure is the adaptation of fertilization in Macrobrachium nipponense.
sentences.chinese: 细胞质结构的特化是日本沼虾受精的适应性结果。

sentences.english: The studies show that the single yarn fine-titring of precursor f.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，单丝细分特化有利于改善原丝的截面形态。

sentences.english: Any departure from this position is a form of specialization.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏离这个位置的都是一种特化形态。

sentences.english: A water-excreting microscopic epidermal structure in many plants.
sentences.chinese: 是植物用来排出体内多余水份的特化分泌结构。

sentences.english: Japanese Lamprey is one of the most primitive extant vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 日本七鳃鳗是现存最原始而特化的脊椎动物之一。

sentences.english: Inheritance should be used only to model a specialization hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 继承只应被用来为特化层次结构建模。

sentences.english: The head is small and it does not feature specific sensorial organs.
sentences.chinese: 双壳贝的头很小，没有特化的感觉器官。

sentences.english: The degeneration and specialization phenomenon showed that they were consanguineously connected with their habitant environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些退化和特化现象与黑斑原的生境有着密切的关系。

definition: Cnidaria (animal phylum including jellyfish and sessile polyps)
Sauropsida, class within Chordata containing reptiles
Phocidae, family within Carnivora including seal
paraphyletic group/also written 並系群|并系群[bing4 xi4 qun2]
